snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton would obviously be a formidable presidential candidate in 2016. But if she runs, one thing is almost certain: she won't be as popular as she is right now.
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton would obviously be a formidable presidential candidate in 2016. But if she runs, one thing is almost certain: she won't be as popular as she is right now.

headline.main: Why Hillary Clinton Would Be Strong in 2016 (It's Not Her Favorability Ratings)
